review: the rooms are very small and expensive. Also every night there is loud sound of the generator and it disturbs the sleep. Good quality rooms are available in the adjacent hotel at a lower rate. The staff is very adamant. The food also seems not good in this hotel.
name: neerajiflex

review: We stayed there in room situated on ground floor at straight from reception, the room having good space, was neat clean well maintained.  Staff people was polite and soft spoken, yes it is not near the 'Har ki Pori' but I will recommend all of you to stay in this hotel,good for families.
name: Kamal Kumar
